actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize additional general officer rank for officers of the Regular Army Medical Service Corps, and to reorganize the Army Medical Service Corps.

summary.text: Authorizes additional general officer rank for officers of the Regular Army Medical Service Corps. Reorganizes the Army Medical Service Corps.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize additional general officer rank for officers of the Regular Army Medical Service Corps, and to reorganize the Army Medical Service Corps.
